Just a few short years ago, a $15 minimum wage was considered a pie-in-the-sky idea. But today, state legislatures and local governments around the country have passed legislation to increase the minimum wage to $15 an hour. Let's keep pushing.

.@SenMajLdr McConnell, @realDonaldTrump, and @SenateGOP are demonstrating why most sexual assault survivors never come forward. But it's not too late to do the right thing. Stop shaming Dr. Ford and twisting yourself into knots to ignore this. Call the FBI and let her testify.

Hey, @SenMajLdr McConnell, @realDonaldTrump, & @SenateGOP: Dr. Ford is not a nuisance. She’s certainly not a speed-bump to "plow" over. She is a person. And it shouldn’t be this difficult for the most powerful men in America to treat her with basic human decency and respect. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1043206491585560576 QT @washingtonpost Analysis | "Kavanaugh will be on the U.S. Supreme Court": McConnell just erased any doubt about Republicans' intentions to hear Ford out https://trib.al/khLovAC
